channel.title: Lego on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Awesome homebrew USB Lego printer printed "Hello World" from a Mac
item.description: The critic says "I like Lego City better."

item.title: The smallest piece of lego
item.description: is still worth fighting over, if you and your brother both want it. What's the smallest piece of lego? A eurobricks forum suggests it is a flower petal. Lugnut says a gold coin, weighing in at just over 0.056 g; the flower petal is a hefty 0.064 g. For reference, a 1x1 plate is 0.176 g and a 1x8 brick is 3.06 g. You'll need a lot of legos to build a lego mosaic.
